title: Coming back after a long break, want to avoid being toxic
body: I still can't even earn hextech stuff... Any tips on remaining sportsmanlike?

replies.body: No participating in chat at all?
You can participate, just learn self-control.
Download Keytweaks, disble both your enter keys and play the game. Impossible to send messages so its impossible to be banned.
The community is still toxic as ever. Wear a hazmat suit.

Hmm...
Step one - don't type in chat.
Step two - mute toxic players.
There is no step three. Just play the game and do your best to win.
